column2: While it is true that [From.GetFirstName] is not my husband's child, there can be no doubt that [From.GetSheHe] is mine. I am determined that [From.GetSheHe will carry on my dynasty even if [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] will not acknowledge [From.GetHerHim]. After all, by our marriage contract all children are of my dynasty.
Try to convince [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] that he is the father.
I don't care about his opinion.

While it is true that [From.GetFirstName] is not my husband's child, there can be no doubt that [From.GetSheHe] is mine. If [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName can not be persuaded to legitimize [From.GetHerHim], then [From.GetSheHe] will carry on my dynasty.

My wife [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] came to me with this entreaty. "My dear [Root.GetFirstName], while I understand that you suspect that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is not your child, but I assure you that [From.GetSheHe] is. I would be most appreciative if you would put aside your suspicions and acknowledge [From.GetHerHim] as your own, for the good of the realm.
For the good of the realm, I shall treat [From.GetHerHim] as my own.
Under no circumstances will I acknowledge that bastard as my child.

My wife [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is openly declaring that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is not my child, and will be of her dynasty, regardless of my wishes, declaring it is her right based on our marriage contract.
